useCase.name: Deploy New App Version with Updated Dataset Type
useCase.trigger: App Developer deploys new app version with updated dataset type

mainSequence.step: Deployment System checks for updated dataset type
Dataset Management deploys new version of dataset type
Dataset Type confirms successful deployment of new version
Dataset Management updates instances to new dataset type version
Dataset Instances confirm successful update of instances
Dataset Management confirms app and dataset deployment success to Deployment System
Deployment System sends deployment success confirmation to App Developer
